snippet.title: Hero Generations Launch Trailer
snippet.description: Trailer for roguelike/4X strategy game Hero Generations by Heart Shaped Games. Launching April 10th 2015 on Steam (http://store.steampowered.com/app/295590), OUYA, Humble Store, and http://www.herogenerations.com! Each turn in Hero Generations is 1 year of your life. Explore procedural worlds, find a mate, have a child, and build a legacy. 2011 IndieCade Finalist. Funded via Kickstarter.
